SEARCH

Package pepse.util

package pepse.util
This package includes all kinds of useful tools for the game that are not directly in touch with the game but help for calculations and graphics. ColorSupplier - A class that provides us an easier way to deal with colors. Constants - A class that holds all our static variables. NoiseGenerator - A class that does calculations for creating waving lines. Round - A class that helps us to round a mathematical expression to the lower floor
Author:
Noam shabat, Samuel Hayat
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    pepse
    This package contains the classes that are used to create the Pepse Game application.
    pepse.world
    This package contains the classes that are used to represent the world in the simulation.
  • Class
    Description
    ColorSupplier
    Provides procedurally-generated colors around a pivot.
    Constants
    The Constants class contains all the constants used in the game.
    Constants.ObjectLayer
    The layers of the game objects
    NoiseGenerator
    A class that helps us to create waving lines based on cyclic functions and its mostly used to generate an unequal terrain
    Round
    Provides a method for rounding numbers to the closest multiple of a given factor.
